StoryTextNPC_FLOOR00_00.text: You still don't have your badge?|It should be ready by now.|I'll let you by just more time.|The badging center is on the 9th floor.|No that's not a dumb place for it.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR01_00.text: We're disrupting the fortune cookie market|using blockchain and crypto.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR01_01.text: We're hiring digital natives with|20+ years of Web3 experience.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR02_00.text: He's so disorganized, I can never find what I'm looking for.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR02_01.text: Make sure to start a 529 when your kids are young.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR03_00.text: I can technically prescribe *anything*.|And our pharmacy is cheaper than others.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR03_01.text: Hey, no line cutting.|I got here before they opened.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR04_00.text: This month we're selling an exclusive line of dolls based on an anime series.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR04_01.text: We're supposed to sell at least 20 of these dolls a day.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR06_00.text: You need to get yourself in shape.|I've lost 10 pounds this year.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR07_Line00.text: Every second we're down we lose $14 million!

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR07_Line01.text: Thanks. I know how high speed trading works.|Maybe if everything we used wasn't from the 90s|it wouldn't break so often.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR07_Line02.text: Where's the other one I sent to the 6th floor|to look for leftover parts?|They used the same computers we have.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR07_Line03.text: You know how the elevators work here.|Are you going to let me work,|or do you want to lose more?

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR08_AllFlags.text: You can use that to enter off-hours too.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR08_StoryFlag.text: Your badge has been ready for a while.|Don't tell me you got lost again.|Go over to the printer & grab it.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR09_00.text: Welcome to Bearly Edible.|Our breakfast choices are Teriyaki pancakes|or sweet & sour hashbrowns.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR09_01_StoryFlag.text: You heard about the free coffee promo?|Take one, sorry it's a little burnt.|This is a burger place.|What kind of coffee do you expect?

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR0A_StoryFlag.text: You heard about the 87 function hammer?|It's true, I use it to change the elevators daily.|I've worked here so long it's the only thing that makes me happy. I've done it long enough though.|Take the hammer so I'm not tempted to start again.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR0B_00.text: Are you interested in a vacation package?|We can send you anywhere in the world for $49.|That's if you don't mind a couple stops.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR0C_00.text: You're listening to WWIP-LPFM.|The station exclusively heard in this building.|This hour we have a special guest.|It's the guy who doesn't work on your floor|but is always using your bathroom.|Don't miss it.|We also have a sponsor today.|The burger place is now serving breakfast.|To celebrate, they're giving a free small coffee to everyone who stops by and says they heard this ad.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR0D_00.text: I'm in charge of this shared auditorium. Any company here can reserve it. No one ever does though.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR0E_Line00.text: He stole my idea for an 87 function hammer!|He needs to talk to me now!

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR0E_Line01.text: I told you, his schedule is booked.|You don't have proof anyway.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR0E_Line02.text: I do! I saw my hammer on the 11th floor!|He stole my idea & sold it himself!

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR0E_Line03.text: You need to leave before I call security.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR0F_00.text: I don't see how this idea will make money.|There's a reason no one translated these weird games already.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR0F_01_Bad.text: This building really took you on a trip.|It's OK, maybe tomorrow will be easier.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR0F_01_Good.text: You're here early.|It's nice to have extra time to settle in.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR0F_01_Perfect.text: Looks like you've had a busy morning.|We have a lot to do today so let's get started.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR05_NoFlags.text: Do I really have time to rummage?

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR05_StoryFlag.text: So this was a 1990s tech company..|Maybe they have something I can use at work..|(rummaging around)..|Oh, it's a copy of NextStep.|I can finally try the N64 devkit.

StoryTextNPC_FLOOR08_GetBadge.text: So that's my badge.|The photo is terrible.

ScriptedEventExample.text: This is an example of a scripted event triggered when entering a scene.
